message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. I believe it could be a valuable asset to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to propose an initial price of $750000. I am looking forward to your response.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $680000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the market value. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $720000. This price reflects the product's unique features and the value it can bring to your business. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your understanding of the product's value, but I'm still not convinced that $720000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'd like to propose a price of $700000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value while also considering my budget.

I understand your position, Bob. After evaluating our costs and the value proposition of our product, I am willing to consider a price of $710000. This amount reflects the product's unique features and capabilities, while also being mindful of your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $700000. I'd like to propose a price of $690000. I believe this is a fair price that balances the product's value with my budget constraints.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After further review, I am willing to consider a price of $705000 for our product. This price reflects a balance between the product's unique value and your budgetary considerations. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not quite there. I'd like to propose a price of $685000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and my budget constraints.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer our product at a price of $700000. This price reflects the product's unique features and capabilities, while also being mindful of your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $690000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's a fair price for the product's value.
